metadata.title: Acme Corp Cloud Platform Security Assessment — Q1 2026 (Update)
metadata.scope: AWS production environment (us-east-1, us-west-2) — customer-facing SaaS platform

controls.description: Multi-factor authentication enforced for all human users accessing AWS console and SSO portal
controls.evidence: Okta MFA policy enforces FIDO2 or TOTP for all 142 employees. AWS IAM policy denies console access without MFA condition. Last audit: 142/142 users MFA-enabled (January 28, 2026).

controls.description: Service accounts use IAM roles with least-privilege policies, no long-lived credentials
controls.evidence: All 23 service accounts use IAM roles attached to ECS tasks or Lambda functions. IAM Access Analyzer confirms no unused permissions in production roles. Zero long-lived access keys in production account.

controls.description: Quarterly access reviews completed for all privileged accounts
controls.evidence: Q4 2025 access review completed on schedule. Former contractor access was revoked within 24 hours of termination. Access review automation now enforces quarterly deadlines.

controls.description: Network segmentation between production, staging, and development environments
controls.evidence: Production VPC (10.0.0.0/16) isolated from staging (10.1.0.0/16) and development (10.2.0.0/16). No VPC peering between production and non-production. Transit Gateway routes verified. Security group audit confirms no cross-environment rules.

frameworks.controlName: Establish and Maintain a Secure Network Architecture

controls.description: Web Application Firewall (WAF) deployed on all public-facing endpoints
controls.evidence: AWS WAF v2 deployed on CloudFront distributions and ALB. Rule groups include AWS Managed Rules (Core, Known Bad Inputs, SQL Database), rate limiting (2000 req/5min per IP), and custom rules for API abuse prevention. 847 blocked requests in past 30 days.
controls.controlName: Boundary Protection | Deny by Default / Allow by Exception

controls.description: Centralized logging for all infrastructure and application events
controls.evidence: CloudTrail (management + data events), VPC Flow Logs, ALB access logs, and application logs shipped to Datadog. Retention: 90 days hot, 1 year cold (S3 Glacier). Log integrity verified via CloudTrail digest files.

controls.description: Encryption at rest for all data stores containing customer data
controls.evidence: RDS PostgreSQL encrypted with KMS CMK (aws/rds). S3 buckets use SSE-S3 (AES-256). EBS volumes encrypted by default. DynamoDB tables use AWS-owned keys. Encryption verified via AWS Config rule 'encrypted-volumes' and 'rds-storage-encrypted'.

controls.description: Incident response plan documented, tested, and communicated to all relevant personnel
controls.evidence: Incident response plan documented (v3.2, last updated October 2025). Plan distributed to security team and on-call engineers. However, the annual tabletop exercise scheduled for Q4 2025 was postponed and has not yet been conducted. Plan references outdated communication channels (Slack channels renamed in Q3 2025).

controls.description: Automated vulnerability scanning in CI/CD pipeline for all deployable artifacts
controls.evidence: Container scans run in GitHub Actions before push to ECR. Dependabot monitors repositories for dependency vulnerabilities. SAST runs in PR checks. Critical findings block deployment (enforced via GitHub branch protection). SLA: Critical=72h, High=7d, Medium=30d.

controls.description: Business continuity and disaster recovery plan with regular backup verification
controls.evidence: RDS automated backups enabled (7-day retention) with cross-region replication to us-west-2. S3 cross-region replication configured for customer data buckets. However, full DR failover has never been tested. RTO target is 4 hours but has not been validated. RPO target is 1 hour based on backup frequency but recovery point has not been verified.

compensatingControls.description: Network-level isolation via Transit Gateway instead of per-VPC firewall appliances
compensatingControls.rationale: Transit Gateway provides equivalent segmentation with centralized route management. Cost-effective for current scale (3 VPCs).

gaps: DR failover testing not yet conducted (planned Q2 2026)
Tabletop exercise for incident response overdue by 2 months
Access review process needs automation to prevent schedule slippage
assessmentContext.scopeCoverage: Covers 100% of customer-facing production infrastructure. Excludes internal corporate IT (separate assessment).
assessmentContext.assessorNotes: Assessment conducted by internal security team with tooling support from scanners and observability platforms. No independent third-party validation in this cycle.
